question.title: How generate a runnable jar increasing the default heap space?
question.body:
The switch -Xmx512M works to me in a JAVA 32 bits when I run a program within the eclipse, for example.

But I want to do this when I generate a runnable jar file, that runs with a double click. But the runnable jar file runs always with the default heap space 64M.

Someone knows how can I increase the heap space for a runnable jar file?
